title: xxSPOTLIGHT Undari's Tower
text: The vile mage left behind all manner of useful recipes. Provided you have the will to use them.
blocka: xxACTION Blue Toad Compress. Remove a minor xxBODY condition by spending xxMANA equal to condition value.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT The Great Hall
text: Fuscus has been known to entertain large groups in the Great Hall.
blocka: xxACTION Rest and Relaxation. Remove a minor xxPSYCHE condition by spending xxFOOD equal to condition value.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Amber Lodge
text: The repurposed barracks of the Amber Hand has become Thea's personal offices.
blocka: xxACTION Map Hall. Look at the top asset card on either draw pile. Take into hand or place back on top of asset draw pile.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Lavender Mill
text: The great hub of Red Bank bustles with activity.
blocka: xxACTION The Exchange. Spend 3 xxPROGRESS to gain three resource dice of any type.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Sightrock Keep
text: At the edge of your vision, looking west, you can just make out Eastkeep wall... looming.
blocka: xxACTION Tactical Planning. Draw the top two asset cards from your asset draw pile.

title: 1) Gray River
text: The Gray River rolls through the shade of the dense elms, carrying dark earth from deeper within the forest.
blocka: xxACTION Mapping the Land. Test (Survival xxPROGRESS).
blockb: xxACTION Logging Operation. Gain 2 xxTIMBER dice.

title: 2) Mirror Woods
text: The dense woods appear to shimmer and twist, a byproduct of the fallen soldiers rotting beneath the roots.
blocka: xxACTION Battles Against the Undead. Test (Combat xxPROGRESS).

title: 3) Undari's Tomb
text: The mage's resting place has become a source of evil. The old wards were not strong enough.
blockb: xxACTION Source of the Undead. Take 2 xxDISCORD to move any number of Restless Dead to this location.

title: 4) Outer Fernbrake
text: Simple folk band together in the shadow of darkness.
blockb: xxFIRE Casualties of the Undead. If there any Restless Dead here, lose 1 xxSTABILITY.

title: 1) Lush Fields
text: Text

title: 2) Salmon Run
text: Text

title: 3) The Weird Rock
text: Text
blocka: xxACTION Journey under the rock (Survival xxPROGRESS).
blockb: xxMOON One character at this location is shaken.

title: 4) Pool Beyond Space and Time
text: Text

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Spirit Lake
text: The clear waters of Spirit Lake reflect back the wisdom of ancestors. Feeding the lake earns the Sunriders' respect.

title: 1) Horsethief Meadows
text: Feats of martial prowess take place across the wide open plains.
blockb: xxACTION Rangers of the South. Spend 5 xxPROGRESS to increase xxSTABILITY track by one.

title: 2) Hogel Manor
text: For a Sunrider, Hogel's decorations and appointments are almost gaudy, and his demeanor doubly so.
blocka: xxACTION Wine and Loathing. Test (Rapport xxPROGRESS).

title: 3) Song Bluff
text: Amongst the Sunriders, honor and family are more important than diversity of thought.
blocka: xxACTION Discussing Battle Plans. Test (Tactics xxPROGRESS).

title: 4) Spirit Lake
text: The clear waters of Spirit Lake reflect back the wisdom of ancestors. Feeding the lake earns the Sunriders' respect.
blockb: xxACTION Speak with the Dead. Spend 4 xxMANA to burn any issue in play at a Sunriders location.

title: 1) First Haven
text: Text
blockb: xxACTION Spend 3 xxLUXURY to discard one threat.

title: 2) Green Haven
text: Text
blockb: Effect: All characters increase their Thievery by Gravewood disposition while at least one character is at this location.
blockc: xxFIRE One character at this location is angry.

title: 3) Spinner Lakes
text: Text
blockb: xxACTION Spend 8 xxLUXURY to gain one xxSECRETS.

title: 4) Maplewood
text: Text

title: 1) The Rosy Freetrader
text: A popular meeting place for both the poor and wealthy of Eastkeep.
blocka: xxACTION Rumors of a frozen hell (Disguise xxPROGRESS).
blockb: xxACTION Cause a Scene. Move one Graycloak to the Rosy Freetrader.

title: 2) Map Hall
text: Somewhere amongst the piles of maps and ledgers are useful Imperial plans.
blockb: xxACTION Spend 2 xxPROGRESS to gain two dice of any one resource.

title: 3) House of Copper
text: Through rings of smoke move cloaked figures willing to provide all manner of things for the right price.

title: 4) Guild of Secrets
text: If there is a nexus of evil in Eastkeep, it is most certainly the guild of secrets.
blockb: xxAIR If possible, move a Graycloak here from another location.

title: 1) Pine Bluff
text: TBD

title: 2) Rocky Outcrop
text: TBD

title: 3) Gray Fores
text: TBD

title: 4) Azure Peak
text: TBD

title: 1) Shimmerhall
text: TBD

title: 2) Arankh
text: TBD
blocka: xxACTION Legend of the Palimpsest (Lore xxPROGRESS).

title: 3) Blue Rock
text: TBD

title: 4) Lower Wash
text: TBD

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Whitehold
text: Graycloak headquarters in the breadbasket of the Empire.
blocka: Add +1 to any tests made at this location.

title: 1) Freeguilder Inn
text: Where everybody - every single body - knows your name.
blockb: xxAIR One character at this location is weary.

title: 2) Dowling Farm
text: Nexus of Imperial discontent.
blockb: xxACTION Spend 5 xxLUXURY to gain one xxSECRETS.

title: 3) Whitehold
text: Graycloak headquarters in the breadbasket of the Empire.
blockb: All guards (obstacles) at this location have +1 xxDISCORD.

title: 4) Under Whitehold
text: The caverns below Whitehold have both riches and traps.
blockb: xxACTION Take two xxDISCORD to gain one xxLUXURY die.
blockc: xxFIRE One character at this location is wounded.

title: 1) Outer Fernbrake
text: The people of Outer Fernbrake are growing to distrust Thea's leadership.
blocka: xxEARTH If there are any Violent Locals here, lower Stability.

title: 2) House of Lavender
text: Swirls of intoxicating smoke tie together the deals and favors with an ephemeral bond.
blocka: xxACTION Spend 2 Mana dice to draw a new Achievement. Discard one of the two Achievements already in play to the bottom of the Achievement draw pile.

title: 3) Graywash Spring
text: The river out of North Oaks winds its way through dense forests and hidden ruins.

title: 4) Sparrow Keep
text: How is it that a nexus of such evil activity was allowed to grow so large?
blocka: xxFIRE Take 1 Discord for each Autarch Spy at this location.

title: 1) Wrenhouse
text: Both regret and conviction in equal measure.
blocka: xxACTION Move an obstacle to this location.

title: 2) Hall of Brass
text: Zarrah greets all newcomers in the great hall of world renown.
blocka: xxFIRE If there are any issues here, one character at a mission location is Angry.

title: 3) Goldspike
text: Who knows what future badness brings but the keeper of secrets in a chamber of gold?
blocka: Effect: Any issues here have +1 xxTRACKING.

title: 4) Beetle Burrough
text: You look like someone who wants to know a secret?
